presentationTable.name: Budget Amount (LC)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Budget Activity Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the specified accounts. Activity Amount = Sum of Debit Amount - Sum of Credit Amount.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Budget.Budget Activity Amount

presentationColumns.name: Budget Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of debit entries amount for the specified accounts.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Budget.Budget Debit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Budget Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of credit entries amount for specified accounts.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Budget.Budget Credit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Budget Absolute Activity Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the absolute activity amount of the specified accounts. Activity Amount=sum of Debit Amount-sum of Credit Amount.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Budget.Budget Absolute Activity Amount
